triples.name: Epistasis
triples.relevance: Core concept describing how genetic interactions affect fitness, central to understanding the evolutionary implications reviewed in the paper

triples.name: Mutation
triples.relevance: Genetic changes whose effects depend on genetic background and whose interactions are examined through fitness landscapes

triples.name: Genotype
triples.relevance: The genetic composition that is mapped to fitness in fitness landscape models reviewed in the paper

triples.name: Phenotype
triples.relevance: Observable characteristics that can be mapped to fitness in fitness landscape analysis alongside genotypes

triples.name: Fitness (biology)
triples.relevance: The measure used in fitness landscapes to represent reproductive success and understand evolutionary outcomes

triples.name: Fitness landscape
triples.relevance: The central theoretical framework mapping genotypes or phenotypes to fitness, which the paper comprehensively reviews and analyzes

triples.name: Evolution
triples.relevance: The evolutionary process whose course and outcome are affected by epistasis as revealed through fitness landscape analysis

triples.name: Adaptation
triples.relevance: The main process whose relationship to epistasis and fitness landscapes is the focus of the paper's analysis
